p: The reduction of body weight during the treatment period was highest in group 1 of 1.8498 g/day and lowest in group 5 of 0.7708 g/d ( Figure 7). The percentage of wound contraction on day 6 (%) after completion of the treatment was in the order of group 5 (100.00%), group 3 (97.22%), group 2 (75.00%), group 4 (55.55%), and group 1 (30.55%). Treatment of NLC-cinnamon oil gel successfully healed the wound in six days.
